column2: "Akoma mu nhyehyɛɛ yɛ nyimpa dze: Na tɛkyerɛma no mbuae fir EWURADZE."
"Ɔdasanyi n’akwan nyinara dzi mu wɔ noara n’enyiwa do: Naaso EWURADZE na oker esunsum."
"Fa wo ndwuma hyɛ EWURADZE nsa
column3: Na dza eyɛ no bowie yie."

column2: "EWURADZE wɔ botae ma biribiara a ɔayɛ: Nyew
column3: emumuyɛfo mpo ama mbusu da no."

column2: "Obiara a ɔyɛ akoma mu ntsɛn no
column3: ɔyɛ EWURADZE n’ekyiwadze: Na hyɛ no nsew dɛ

column2: "Adɔyɛ na nokwardzi na wɔdze pepa emumuyɛ: Na wɔdze EWURADZE ho suro kwetsir mbusu."
"Sɛ nyimpa n’akwan sɔ EWURADZE enyi a
column3: Ɔma n’atamfo mpo nye no tsena asomdwee mu."

column2: "Adze kakrabaa a tsenenee ka ho no
column3: oye Sen ndɔbaa pii a pɛrpɛr nnyi mu."

column2: "Nyimpa n’akoma na ɔhyehyɛ no kwan: Naaso EWURADZE na ɔtaataa n’anamɔn."
"Nkɔnhyɛ wɔ Ɔhen n’anomu: N’ano so nnkɔfom atsɛmbu mu."
"Abrambo na nsɛn tsenee yɛ EWURADZE dze. Foto mu abo nyinara n’edwuma a."
"Ɔyɛ mbusu ma ahemfo dɛ wɔbɛyɛ ewurkadze: Osiandɛ ndzeyɛtsenenee na ɔma ahengua tsim."
"Ahemfo enyigye nye ano tsenenee: Na wɔdɔ nyia ɔkasa nokwar."
"Ɔhen n’ebufuw tse dɛ owu n’abɔfoe: Naaso onyansafo bɛpata no."
"Ɔhen n’enyimtsewee mu na nkwa wɔ: Na n’enyimpa tse dɛ ɔbɛsɛber nsuwusiw."
"Mbrɛ odua ye dodow dɛ wobenya nyansa asen sika a! Nyew
column3: oye dɛ wɔsan mu yi ntseasee ne nyae sen dwetɛ."

column2: "Riyi mbusu akwa nye tɔɔtsenyɛfo tsempɔn: Nyia ɔhwɛ no kwan yie no
"Ahomemado dzi ɔsɛɛ enyim
column3: Na ahopɔw sunsum dze asehwe ba."

column2: "Oye dɛ enye abɔbɔfo benya ahobrɛadze sunsum
column3: Sen dɛ enye nkontompɔfo bɛkyɛ asadze."

column2: "Nyia ɔdwen asɛm no do no
column3: obohu papa; Na obiara a ɔdze no werɛ hyɛ EWURADZE mu no

column2: "Akoma mu onyansafo no wɔbɛfrɛ no ɔbadwembanyi: Na anotsewee krɔn adzesua."
"Ntseasee yɛ nkwa nsubura ma nyia ɔwɔ no: Na nkwasea asotwe nye hɔn nkwaseadze."
"Onyansafo akoma kyerɛkyerɛ n’ano
"Nsɛm a ɔyɛ dɛw tse dɛ wokyɛm
"Ɔkwan bi wɔ hɔ a ɔyɛ dɛ ɔtsen ma nyimpa
"Odwumayɛfo n’akɔndɔ ma ɔyɛ edwuma yie; Osiandɛ ɔdze hwehwɛ dza obedzi."
"Nyimpa huhuw susu mbusu
column3: Na n’ano tse dɛ ogya a ɔhyehye."

column2: "Nyimpa kɔntɔnkyenyi tow mansotwe petse: Na bɔ tom kɛka no tsetsew anyɛnko brɛbo ntamu."
"Ɔkakabenyi no daadaa ne nyɛnko
column3: Na ɔgye no kɔ ɔhaw mu."

column2: "Hwɛ woho yie wɔ nyia ɔyerɛw n’ano na obu n’enyi kyerɛ wo no ho
"Otsigon yɛ enyimnyam abɔtsir
"Nyia ɔfa ebufuw nyaa no
column3: oye sen ɔkatakyi: Na nyia ɔhyɛ no sunsum do no

column2: "Aserɛ do na wɔtwe tonto; Naaso atsɛmbu nyinara dze
